post.title: 👋 Welcome to my blog!
post.content:
# 👋 Welcome to my blog!

Hello there 👋!

I’m BasicPixel, and this is my blog.

---

I will be posting about web development topics / tutorials every now and then. I hope you find interesting stuff here!

Fun fact: this blog uses Notion as a CMS. You can view all pages directly in Notion at the top of the page by clicking the “View in Notion” button.

- If you are interested in how I did this, you can check the source code of this blog section [here](https://github.com/BasicPixel/basicpixel.github.io/tree/main/pages/blog)
    - There is also a free [egghead.io](http://egghead.io) course on this topic: ****[Build Static Pages Dynamically using Next.js and the Notion API](https://egghead.io/courses/build-static-pages-dynamically-using-next-js-and-the-notion-api-34849fc4)****
